VIII_CD ._.
Monseigneur_NNP in_IN the_DT Country_NN A_NN beautiful_JJ landscape_NN ,_, with_IN the_DT corn_NN bright_JJ in_IN it_PRP ,_, but_CC not_RB abundant_JJ ._.

The_DT half-dozen_NN who_WP were_VBD peering_VBG at_IN the_DT chain_NN were_VBD still_RB among_IN the_DT wheels_NNS ,_, like_IN sheep_NN ;_: the_DT wheels_NNS turned_VBD so_RB suddenly_RB that_IN they_PRP were_VBD lucky_JJ to_TO save_VB their_PRP$ skins_NNS and_CC bones_NNS ;_: they_PRP had_VBD very_RB little_JJ else_JJ to_TO save_VB ,_, or_CC they_PRP might_MD not_RB have_VB been_VBN so_RB fortunate_JJ ._.
The_DT burst_NN with_IN which_WDT the_DT carriage_NN started_VBD out_IN of_IN the_DT village_NN and_CC up_IN the_DT rise_NN beyond_IN ,_, was_VBD soon_RB checked_VBN by_IN the_DT steepness_NN of_IN the_DT hill_NN ._.

He_PRP could_MD not_RB but_CC admit_VBP to_TO himself_PRP that_IN he_PRP might_MD not_RB have_VB made_VBN this_DT journey_NN ,_, if_IN he_PRP could_MD have_VB foreseen_VBN the_DT events_NNS of_IN a_DT few_JJ days_NNS ._.

III_NNP ._.

V._NNP The_NNP Wood-Sawyer_NNP One_CD year_NN and_CC three_CD months_NNS ._.
During_IN all_DT that_DT time_NN Lucie_NNP was_VBD never_RB sure_JJ ,_, from_IN hour_NN to_TO hour_NN ,_, but_CC that_IN the_DT Guillotine_NN would_MD strike_VB off_RP her_PRP$ husband_NN 's_POS head_NN next_JJ day_NN ._.
Every_DT day_NN ,_, through_IN the_DT stony_JJ streets_NNS ,_, the_DT tumbrils_NNS now_RB jolted_VBD heavily_RB ,_, filled_VBN with_IN Condemned_VBN ._.

X._NNP The_NNP Substance_NNP of_IN the_DT Shadow_NNP ``_`` I_PRP ,_, Alexandre_NNP Manette_NNP ,_, unfortunate_JJ physician_NN ,_, native_NN of_IN Beauvais_NNP ,_, and_CC afterwards_RB resident_JJ in_IN Paris_NNP ,_, write_VB this_DT melancholy_JJ paper_NN in_IN my_PRP$ doleful_JJ cell_NN in_IN the_DT Bastille_NNP ,_, during_IN the_DT last_JJ month_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, 1767_CD ._.

\*\*\*\*\*_NN ``_`` The_DT carriage_NN left_VBD the_DT streets_NNS behind_IN ,_, passed_VBD the_DT North_NNP Barrier_NNP ,_, and_CC emerged_VBD upon_IN the_DT country_NN road_NN ._.
